"Great group of guys, Great work, Professional service." "MRR is unbeatable when it comes to price and workmanship!" "Jeff and milton great salesman even better workers would def recommend 10/10"

Kris was great to work with. I had issues with rainwater leaking in during every storm, and he fixed it fast and effectively. It has rained a few times since, and everything has stayed completely dry. Professional, reliable, and worth every penny. Highly recommend!

I recently had the pleasure of working with Metroplex Roofing & Remodeling for a complete remodel of my home, and I cannot express how thrilled I am with the results! From start to finish, their professionalism, attention to detail, and … More

I have known and worked with Kris for 10 years now, and I cannot recommend him enough! He is highly skilled in more complex projects (i.e. complex roofs, large properties, HOAs) that some contractors may tend to stray from, but he is also … More
